section.p: ContentMap may show more than one view in separate tabs. These profiled views are defined in stylesheet by several csl:profile instructions. When one of the profiled views is chosen only csl:template instructions that match chosen csl:profile will be used to generate ContentMap tree.

li.p: The optional name attribute defines profile name.
The required inscription attribute defines inscription for the profile tab.
The optional icon attribute defines icon name for profile tab.
The optional cutoff-level attribute defines how deeply element tree will be opened initially. Default value is "5".
